# AMBITION-CLASS ATMOSPHERICS PLATFORM

[color=#a4885c]Recommended Crew:[/color] 4-8

"Declassified gas production and distribution platform seized in a hostile takeover of an Atmosian conglomerate. For the ultimate insurgent."
# PREFLIGHT CHECKLIST
## 1. Power supply
## 1.1. Battery units
- Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the substation unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the APC unit's Main Breaker is toggled on. - Check the APC unit's current Load* (W).
## 1.2. AME generator unit.
- Check that the AME core is properly shielded. - Check that the AME controller unit is anchored to the floor. - Check the AME controller unit Fuel Status. - Check the AME controller unit Injection Amount. - Toggle Injection.
## 2. Atmospherics
## 2.1. Distribution Loop
- Check that the O2 output pump is set to 101kPa. - Enable the O2 output pump. - Check that the N2 output pump is set to 101kPa. - Enable N2 output pump. - Check that the gas mixer is set to the correct mixing ratio (21% Oxygen, 79% Nitrogen). - Check that the gas mixer is set to 101kPa. - Enable gas mixer. - Check that the distribution pump is set to 101kPa. - Enable distribution pump.
## 2.2. Waste Loop
- Enable waste loop pump and valve(s). - Enable waste loop filters. - Set appropriate gases for each storage chamber as needed.
## 2.3. Mix Loop
- Enable mix loop pumps. - Disable Auto Mode on the air alarm in the Mix Room. - Set the four air vents on the air alarm to Siphoning Mode and set Pressure Bounds to NoBound. - Anchor gas canisters to Connector Ports as needed.
## 3. Other checks
- Check that the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the blast doors are closed.
## Sidenotes
* - Ambition-class atmospheric platforms are equipped with eight APC units that can be used to appraise the ship's total power consumption. Unmodified Ambition-class ship requires 71 kW of power to remain operational.
